infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow access to your camera to capture photos of damaged assets for reporting purposes
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: We would like to track your activity to provide a better experience and personalized content.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow access to your camera to capture photos of damaged assets for reporting purposes.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to use your location to track your check in and check out location.

plugins.userTrackingPermission: We would like to track your activity to provide a better experience and personalized content.
